org.sql: SELECT SUM(hours) FROM work_packages LEFT OUTER JOIN relations ON work_packages.id = relations.from_id AND relations.hierarchy >= 0 AND relations.relates = 0 AND relations.duplicates = 0 AND relations.follows = 0 AND relations.blocks = 0 AND relations.includes = 0 AND relations.requires = 0 AND work_packages.id = 683 LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages AS descendants ON relations.to_id = descendants.id AND descendants.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('work_package_tracking') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True) LEFT OUTER JOIN time_entries ON time_entries.work_package_id = descendants.id AND time_entries.id IN (SELECT time_entries.id FROM time_entries WHERE time_entries.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('costs') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True) OR time_entries.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('costs') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True) AND time_entries.user_id = 4772) WHERE work_packages.id = "$1" GROUP BY work_packages.id

rewrites.sql: SELECT SUM(hours) FROM work_packages LEFT OUTER JOIN relations ON work_packages.id = relations.from_id AND relations.hierarchy >= 0 AND relations.relates = 0 AND relations.duplicates = 0 AND relations.follows = 0 AND relations.blocks = 0 AND relations.includes = 0 AND relations.requires = 0 AND work_packages.id = 683 LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages AS descendants ON relations.to_id = descendants.id AND descendants.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('work_package_tracking') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True) LEFT OUTER JOIN time_entries ON time_entries.work_package_id = descendants.id AND time_entries.id IN (SELECT time_entries.id FROM time_entries WHERE time_entries.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('costs') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True) OR time_entries.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('costs') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True) AND time_entries.user_id = 4772) WHERE work_packages.id = "$1" GROUP BY work_packages.id LIMIT 1
